title: 'Show off or motivation?': Paul Pogba puts in the hard work on his Dubai break
text:
Paul Pogba is working towards a Manchester United return - but still appears to be some way off as he trains in Dubai's state-of-the-art Transform Altitude Performance Center.

Pogba midfielder has been out of action since the end of September and has had a stop-start season so far due to a series of injuries.

He has been recovering and training in Dubai over the international break, and has now posted a video of him working out on the rope - but he is still right leg is still wrapped up in bandages.

Paul Pogba has posted a video of himself working out while wearing bandages on his right leg

The Frenchman is in Dubai, working on his return from an injury to his right foot

Alongside the video, Pogba wrote: 'Almost there. Show off or motivation. You choose? Same result at the end anyway. #enjoyworking'

It has been reported that Pogba is not too far away from a return, although his availability for United's next game - against Liverpool on October 20 - remains in significant doubt.

He missed recent matches against Leicester and West Ham due to an ankle injury, before returning to face Rochdale and Arsenal.

He then sat out of both a trip to AZ Alkmaar and United's defeat by Newcastle last Sunday.

In fact, Pogba has only played in one win so far this season, albeit a comprehensive one, over Chelsea on the first day of the season.

United are desperate to get Pogba back to fitness after the international break
description: Paul Pogba is working towards a Manchester United return - but still appears to be some way off as he trains in Dubai's state-of-the-art Transform Altitude Performance Center.
